EXAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: Why is an example keyword on an actual card

SOULSTEAL.DESCRIPTION: When attacking you, grants you a buff for each stack. NL Human: 2 #yLight. NL Kitsune: 2 #yWill-o-Wisps (static). NL Fox: 2 #yDark.

WILL-O-WISP.DESCRIPTION: Consumes itself at the end of your turn to deal damage equal to the number of wisps.

SHAPESHIFT.DESCRIPTION: Aspect effects of that #yShape will trigger and you gain minor persistent effects.

SHAPE.DESCRIPTION: Aspect effects of that #yShape will trigger and you gain minor persistent effects.
